templates.title: Archon with SaaS Supabase
templates.description: Deploy Archon AI coding assistant with external Supabase (supabase.com). Includes all core services: server, MCP, agents, and web UI.
templates.note: Requires a Supabase project at supabase.com. Get your SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY from your project settings.

env.name: SUPABASE_URL
env.label: Supabase URL
env.description: Your Supabase project URL (e.g., https://your-project.supabase.co)

env.name: SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY
env.label: Supabase Service Key
env.description: Your Supabase service role secret key from project settings

env.name: HOST
env.label: Host Domain
env.description: Your domain name or IP address (default: localhost)

env.name: ARCHON_SERVER_PORT
env.label: Server Port
env.description: Port for the main API server

env.name: ARCHON_MCP_PORT
env.label: MCP Port
env.description: Port for the Model Context Protocol server

env.name: ARCHON_AGENTS_PORT
env.label: Agents Port
env.description: Port for the AI agents service

env.name: ARCHON_UI_PORT
env.label: UI Port
env.description: Port for the web interface

env.name: LOG_LEVEL
env.label: Log Level
env.description: Application log level

env.name: LOGFIRE_TOKEN
env.label: Logfire Token (Optional)
env.description: Logfire token for enhanced logging and monitoring

env.name: ARCHON_EMBEDDINGS_PORT
env.label: TEI Embeddings Port
env.description: Port for the Text Embeddings Inference server

env.name: EMBEDDING_MODEL_ID
env.label: TEI Model ID
env.description: Hugging Face model ID for local embeddings

env.name: TEI_MEMORY_LIMIT
env.label: TEI Memory Limit
env.description: Memory limit for TEI container

env.name: TEI_CPU_LIMIT
env.label: TEI CPU Limit
env.description: CPU limit for TEI container

templates.title: Archon Self-Hosted (Full Stack)
templates.description: Deploy Archon with a complete self-hosted Supabase stack. Includes PostgreSQL, Auth, REST API, Realtime, and all Archon services. Perfect for complete data privacy.
templates.note: This is a complete self-contained deployment. No external dependencies required. Includes PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

env.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
env.label: PostgreSQL Password
env.description: Secure password for PostgreSQL database

env.name: JWT_SECRET
env.label: JWT Secret
env.description: Secret key for JWT tokens (minimum 32 characters)

env.name: SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
env.label: Service Role Key
env.description: JWT token for service role access

env.name: POSTGRES_DB
env.label: Database Name
env.description: PostgreSQL database name

env.name: POSTGRES_USER
env.label: Database User
env.description: PostgreSQL username

env.name: HOST
env.label: Host Domain
env.description: Your domain name or IP address

env.name: ARCHON_SERVER_PORT
env.label: Server Port
env.description: Port for the main API server

env.name: ARCHON_MCP_PORT
env.label: MCP Port
env.description: Port for the Model Context Protocol server

env.name: ARCHON_AGENTS_PORT
env.label: Agents Port
env.description: Port for the AI agents service

env.name: ARCHON_UI_PORT
env.label: UI Port
env.description: Port for the web interface

env.name: API_EXTERNAL_URL
env.label: External API URL
env.description: External URL for API access

env.name: SITE_URL
env.label: Site URL
env.description: External URL for the web interface

env.name: LOG_LEVEL
env.label: Log Level
env.description: Application log level

env.name: ARCHON_EMBEDDINGS_PORT
env.label: TEI Embeddings Port
env.description: Port for the Text Embeddings Inference server

env.name: EMBEDDING_MODEL_ID
env.label: TEI Model ID
env.description: Hugging Face model ID for local embeddings

env.name: TEI_MEMORY_LIMIT
env.label: TEI Memory Limit
env.description: Memory limit for TEI container

env.name: TEI_CPU_LIMIT
env.label: TEI CPU Limit
env.description: CPU limit for TEI container
